sections.heading: Focus
sections.body: Commit to the full 40 days. If you miss a required item, reset to Day 1. Begin in Christ. https://www.churchofjesuschrist.org/study/scriptures/bofm/2-ne/25?lang=eng&id=p26-p27#p26

sections.heading: Study Prompt
sections.body: Read a chapter from the Standard Works and write 2–3 sentences in your journal about what stood out.
Make prayer morning and night non-negotiable. Build the habit.
